unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a Boost - No More Range Anxiety, Arre!**
normalised: **E V Charging Gets a Boost - No More Range Anxiety, Arre!**

unnormalised: Bangalore - Folks heading back to their hometowns for Diwali, listen up! EV charging infrastructure is finally catching up, thanks to a new initiative by IIT Madras. They're partnering with several startups to deploy fast-charging stations along major highways like the Mumbai-Pune expressway.
normalised: Bangalore - Folks heading back to their hometowns for Diwali, listen up! E V charging infrastructure is finally catching up, thanks to a new initiative by I I T Madras. They're partnering with several startups to deploy fast-charging stations along major highways like the Mumbai-Pune expressway.

unnormalised: Imagine driving your Tata Nexon EV all the way from Delhi to Jaipur without sweating about where to plug in next! Forget range anxiety, Picture abhi baaki hai mere dost!
normalised: Imagine driving your Tata Nexon E V all the way from Delhi to Jaipur without sweating about where to plug in next! Forget range anxiety, Picture abhi baaki hai mere dost!

unnormalised: The government is also throwing its weight behind the plan, offering subsidies for installing charging points in residential areas, especially in apartment complexes in Gurgaon and Noida.
normalised: The government is also throwing its weight behind the plan, offering subsidies for installing charging points in residential areas, especially in apartment complexes in Gurgaon and Noida.

unnormalised: Expect to see more charging stations popping up at petrol pumps and even your local kirana store. They are aiming to install a charging station every 50 km.
normalised: Expect to see more charging stations popping up at petrol pumps and even your local kirana store. They are aiming to install a charging station every fifty kilometer.

unnormalised: Reliance BP is also investing heavily, promising rapid charging options. Soon, you’ll be able to juice up your EV while grabbing a chai and samosa.
normalised: Reliance B P is also investing heavily, promising rapid charging options. Soon, you’ll be able to juice up your E V while grabbing a chai and samosa.

unnormalised: The cost? Initial estimates suggest around Rs. 10 per unit.
normalised: The cost? Initial estimates suggest around rupee ten per unit.

unnormalised: So, ditch the petrol guzzler and go electric, ya!
normalised: So, ditch the petrol guzzler and go electric, ya!
